articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: 7-year-old leaps into action to help pregnant teacher who passed out
articles.description: Max Angel sprang into action and ran for the school nurse when Jessica Muolo, his pregnant teacher, suddenly passed out. Muolo and her baby are doing fine and Angel was given an award for his bravery.

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Small Illinois village preps for second total eclipse in 7 years
articles.description: The village of Makanda, Illinois, is home to roughly 600 people. But thousands are expected to come for Monday's total solar eclipse, with Makanda directly in the path of totality, just as it was back in 2017. Roxana Saberi has the story.

articles.title: Breaking down Biden-Netanyahu call on World Central Kitchen deaths
articles.description: President Biden and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu spoke Thursday for the first time since an IDF strike killed seven World Central Kitchen workers in Gaza. CBS News' Olivia Gazis and Nancy Cordes have the details.
